remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonEventHandler> and then invokes it. For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
